verses.verse: <S%H113>For,<s%> behold, the Lord, <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> takes <S%H5493>away<s%> from <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> and from <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H4937>supply<s%> and <S%H4937>support,<s%> the whole <S%H4937>supply<s%> of <S%H3899>bread,<s%> and the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H4937>supply<s%> of <S%H4325>water;<s%>
the mighty <S%H1368>man,<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H4421>war,<s%> the <S%H8199>judge,<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> the <S%H7080>diviner,<s%> the <S%H2205>elder,<s%>

the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of <S%H2572>fifty,<s%> the <S%H5375>honorable<s%> <S%H6440>man,<s%> the <S%H3289>counselor,<s%> the <S%H2450>skilled<s%> <S%H2791>craftsman,<s%> and the <S%H995>clever<s%> <S%H3908>enchanter.<s%>
I will <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H5288>boys<s%> to be their <S%H8269>princes,<s%> and <S%H5288>children<s%> shall rule over <S%H4910>them.<s%>

The <S%H5971>people<s%> will be <S%H5065>oppressed,<s%> <S%H376>everyone<s%> by <S%H376>another,<s%> and <S%H376>everyone<s%> by his <S%H7453>neighbor.<s%> The <S%H5288>child<s%> will behave himself <S%H7292>proudly<s%> against the <S%H2205>old<s%> <S%H7034>man,<s%> and the base against the <S%H3513>honorable.<s%>

Indeed a <S%H376>man<s%> shall take <S%H8610>hold<s%> of his <S%H251>brother<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of his <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H8071>saying,<s%> "You have clothing, you be our <S%H7101>ruler,<s%> and let this <S%H4384>ruin<s%> be under your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>"

In that <S%H3117>day<s%> he will <S%H5375>cry<s%> <S%H559>out,<s%> saying, "I will not be a <S%H2280>healer;<s%> for in my <S%H1004>house<s%> is neither <S%H3899>bread<s%> nor <S%H8071>clothing.<s%> You shall not <S%H7760>make<s%> me <S%H7101>ruler<s%> of the <S%H5971>people.<s%>"

For <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> is <S%H3782>ruined,<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah<s%> is <S%H5307>fallen;<s%> because their <S%H3956>tongue<s%> and their <S%H4611>doings<s%> are against <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> to <S%H4784>provoke<s%> the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of his <S%H3519>glory.<s%>

The <S%H1971>look<s%> of their <S%H6440>faces<s%> testify against <S%H6030>them.<s%> They <S%H5046>parade<s%> their <S%H2403>sin<s%> like <S%H5467>Sodom.<s%> They <S%H3582>don't<s%> hide <S%H188>it.<s%> Woe to their <S%H5315>soul!<s%> For they have <S%H1580>brought<s%> disaster upon <S%H7451>themselves.<s%>
<S%H559>Tell<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H2896>"Good!<s%>" For they shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of their <S%H4611>deeds.<s%>
<S%H188>Woe<s%> to the <S%H7563>wicked!<s%> <S%H7451>Disaster<s%> is upon <S%H1576>them;<s%> for the deeds of his <S%H3027>hands<s%> will be paid back to <S%H6213>him.<s%>

As for my <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H5953>children<s%> are their <S%H5065>oppressors,<s%> and <S%H802>women<s%> <S%H4910>rule<s%> over <S%H5971>them.<s%> My people, those who <S%H833>lead<s%> you cause you to <S%H8582>err,<s%> and <S%H1104>destroy<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of your <S%H734>paths.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> stands <S%H5324>up<s%> to <S%H7378>contend,<s%> and <S%H5975>stands<s%> to <S%H1777>judge<s%> the <S%H5971>peoples.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H935>enter<s%> into <S%H4941>judgment<s%> with the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of his <S%H5971>people,<s%> and their <S%H8269>leaders:<s%> "It is you who have eaten <S%H1197>up<s%> the <S%H3754>vineyard.<s%> The <S%H1500>spoil<s%> of the <S%H6041>poor<s%> is in your <S%H1004>houses.<s%>

What do you mean that you <S%H1792>crush<s%> my <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H1792><s%> and <S%H2912>grind<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H6041>poor?<s%>" <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord,<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies.<s%>

Moreover <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3282>"Because<s%> the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%> are <S%H1361>haughty,<s%> and <S%H3212>walk<s%> with <S%H5186>outstretched<s%> <S%H1627>necks<s%> and <S%H8265>flirting<s%> <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> <S%H1980>walking<s%> to <S%H2952>trip<s%> as they <S%H3212>go,<s%> <S%H5913>jingling<s%> ornaments on their <S%H7272>feet;<s%>

therefore the <S%H136>Lord<s%> brings <S%H5596>sores<s%> on the crown of the <S%H6936>head<s%> of the <S%H1323>women<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will make their <S%H6596>scalps<s%> <S%H6168>bald.<s%>"
In that <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> will take <S%H5493>away<s%> the <S%H8597>beauty<s%> of their <S%H5914>anklets,<s%> the <S%H7636>headbands,<s%> the crescent <S%H7720>necklaces,<s%>
the <S%H5188>earrings,<s%> the <S%H8285>bracelets,<s%> the <S%H7479>veils,<s%>
the <S%H6287>headdresses,<s%> the <S%H6807>ankle<s%> <S%H7196>chains,<s%> the sashes, the perfume <S%H5315>bottles,<s%> the <S%H3908>charms,<s%>
the signet <S%H2885>rings,<s%> the <S%H639>nose<s%> <S%H2885>rings,<s%>
the fine <S%H4254>robes,<s%> the <S%H4595>capes,<s%> the <S%H4304>cloaks,<s%> the <S%H2754>purses,<s%>
the hand <S%H1549>mirrors,<s%> the fine <S%H5466>linen<s%> <S%H6797>garments,<s%> the tiaras, and the <S%H7289>shawls.<s%>

It shall happen that instead of sweet <S%H1314>spices,<s%> there shall be <S%H4716>rottenness;<s%> instead of a <S%H2290>belt,<s%> a <S%H5364>rope;<s%> instead of well <S%H4639>set<s%> <S%H4748>hair,<s%> <S%H7144>baldness;<s%> instead of a <S%H6614>robe,<s%> a <S%H4228>wearing<s%> of <S%H8242>sackcloth;<s%> and <S%H3587>branding<s%> instead of <S%H3308>beauty.<s%>
Your <S%H4962>men<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and your <S%H1369>mighty<s%> in the <S%H4421>war.<s%>
Her <S%H6607>gates<s%> shall <S%H578>lament<s%> and <S%H56>mourn;<s%> and she shall be <S%H5352>desolate<s%> and <S%H3427>sit<s%> on the <S%H776>ground.<s%>
